trends: There have been 37 other sightings in Fort Lauderdale
There were no other sightings in Fort Lauderdale on or around April 11th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI am pretty sure it was a meteor. While sitting in my living room, I was looking out my back sliding glass door and saw a BlueGreen object descending at a steep angle of 15-30 degrees. It entered at aprox. 2 O'clock position from a West to Easterly trajectory. It was a large meteor and very brilliantly lit atypical blue green which then turned orange as it elongated and sparked as pieces broke forward of the main body. It then burnt out. I am reporting this to clarify any questionable sittings for this date. I don't know if this should be reported to any other agency?
